name: Bikkuriman Kanjuku Haoh: Sanmi Douran Sensouki
name_original: Bikkuriman Kanjuku Haoh: Sanmi Douran Sensouki
description:
Bikkuriman Kanjuku Haoh: Sanmi Douran Sensouki is a RPG game developed by Nippon Ichi Software. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Nippon Ichi Software.
You can play Bikkuriman Kanjuku Haoh: Sanmi Douran Sensouki on Nintendo 3DS.
